title: WHEN A BLACK WOMAN PRAYS: How Church and Faith Change BLACK WOMEN
description: This book is a REVISED dedication to black women that never wavered in their faith or personal relationship with God. In this revised edition, you have black women sharing their personal experiences of pain, depression, hurt, and how God replaced their complexities with happiness and positive change. Black women and their faith in God have always had tremendous success in changing the conditions of their family, community and social concerns. This Revised Edition book conveys more importantly how God is real and why he is always on time. Pray on beautiful black women, lift up your praises so we all can shower in the bliss that heaven will rain down from the power of your praise.ABOUT THE AUTHORRAYMOND STURGIS is the author of many Great Selling ACT LIKE A LADY, DO NOT THINK LIKE A MAN , WHY DO BLACK MEN HURT THEIR WOMEN?, THE WORLD CHANGERS, CHANGING THE BLACK WOMAN IN THE MIRROR, and A BLACK CHILD SHALL NOT LEAD THEM. Raymond Sturgis understands that people love great reading and important issues that concern them, and he continues to submit quality books for the world to enjoy.
author: Raymond Sturgis
